data.author: Mark Skousen
data.quote: Taxation is the price we pay for failing to build a civilized society. The higher the tax level, the greater the failure. A centrally planned totalitarian state represents a complete defeat for the civilized world, while a totally voluntary society represents its ultimate success.

data.author: Nido Qubein
data.quote: Your present circumstances don't determine where you can go; they merely determine where you start.

data.author: Aristotle
data.quote: Quality is not an act, it is a habit.

data.author: Denis Waitley
data.quote: Time is the most precious element of human existence. The successful person knows how to put energy into time and how to draw success from time.

data.author: Zac Hanson
data.quote: It's cool to have critical success because it's always nice for your peers to say, 'Good job.' But who cares about them?

data.author: Michelangelo
data.quote: Lord, grant that I may always desire more than I can accomplish.

data.author: Audrey Hepburn
data.quote: Nothing is impossible, the word itself says 'I'm possible'!

data.author: Christopher Morley
data.quote: Act like you expect to get into the end zone.

data.author: David McCullough
data.quote: Real success is finding you lifework in the work that you love.

data.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
data.quote: We aim above the mark to hit the mark.

data.author: Marlee Matlin
data.quote: Silence is the last thing the world will ever hear from me.

data.author: Jim Rohn
data.quote: Formal education will make you a living; self-education will make you a fortune.

data.author: Johann Sebastian Bach
data.quote: I was obliged to be industrious. Whoever is equally industrious will succeed equally well.

data.author: Vince Lombardi
data.quote: The only place success comes before work is in the dictionary.

data.author: George S. Patton
data.quote: A good plan violently executed now is better than a perfect plan executed next week.

data.author: Maria Bartiromo
data.quote: I think that my biggest attribute to any success that I have had is hard work. There really is no substitute for working hard.

data.author: Kevin Bacon
data.quote: Part of being a man is learning to take responsibility for your successes and for your failures. You can't go blaming others or being jealous. Seeing somebody else's success as your failure is a cancerous way to live.

data.author: William Bartram
data.quote: On the recollection of so many and great favours and blessings, I now, with a high sense of gratitude, presume to offer up my sincere thanks to the Almighty, the Creator and Preserver.

data.author: Malcolm Forbes
data.quote: Failure is success if we learn from it.

data.author: Edmund Hillary
data.quote: Good planning is important. I've also regarded a sense of humor as one of the most important things on a big expedition. When you're in a difficult or dangerous situation, or when you're depressed about the chances of success, someone who can make you laugh eases the tension.
